item.title: Python library for the FitBit API
item.description: My quest of building API wrappers in python continues with the FitBit. The handy devices tracks most of my activities and movements during daytime. So it's an excellent self-tracking device, especially with the wireless sync. There wasn't an API interface available in python, so with some borrowed code I decided to build my own. I made an GitHub repository with the code and an example for you to use.Â Please fork and correct any changes that you think would be useful for me to learn!
